EmailTemplate.name: 8/21/2014 - Mary Washington Webinar.Invitation_8_18_2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Today! Register to Win a Quadcopter | Automation, Efficiency, & Control in the Datacenter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> [Webinar <http://bit.ly/1vNvrA5>]
How Mary Washington Healthcare Used VMTurbo to Save $180K on Day 1 Register to Win a Hubsan X4 RC Quadcopter! <http://bit.ly/1vNvrA5> Assure Performance, & Automate Optimal Sizing and Placement With a Single Control System Technology Architecture Manager George Amols manages Mary Washington's two vCenters and a variety of vendor technologies to provide the platform on which MWHC operates. Learn directly from Mr. Amols' experience <http://bit.ly/1vNvrA5> about the ways VMTurbo has been an invaluable control system for Mary Washington's virtual infrastructure as well as recommendations for best practices in smarter virtualization management. We'll cover:
- The challenges of using traditional monitoring tools in a dynamic, growing environment
- How Mary Washington uses VMTurbo to eliminate contention performance issues, maximize uptime, and maintain a healthy state for both IT and its patients
- How Mary Washington uses VMTurbo to run intelligent capacity reports - on the fly - that help them grow into their infrastructure as efficiently as possible
- A demo of VMTurbo, the world’s only unified cloud and virtualization control system Register Now <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-mary-washington-healthcare-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=mwhc> Downloads White Papers Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
